title: The distinction between real and nominal trinitarians examined and the doctrine of a real Trinity vindicated from the charge of Tritheism : in answer to a late Socinian pamphlet, entituled, The judgment of a disinterested person, concerning the controversie about the Blessed Trinity, depending between Dr. S--th, and Dr. Sherlock.
author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to William Sherlock. cf. NUC pre-1956.
